92.eng-name: Afflictions and the End of the World

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Musa:The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "If anyone of you passed through our mosque or through our market while carrying arrows, he should hold the iron heads," or said, "..... he should hold (their heads) firmly with his hand lest he should injure one of the Muslims with it

chapter.ara-name: باب قَوْلِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم " مَنْ حَمَلَ عَلَيْنَا السِّلاَحَ فَلَيْسَ مِنَّا "
chapter.eng-name: “Whosoever takes up arms against us, is not from us.”
